item.description: Group PhD Students Joe Saber (joined Fall 2023) Undergraduate Students Christopher Bruinsma (UR, class of 2023) Quan Luu (UR, class of 2023) Yoo (Daniel) Choi (UR, class of 2024) Chengkai (Kai) Kang (UR, class of 2024) Junfei Liu (UR, class of 2024) Matthew Iceland (UR, class of 2025) Kiet Nguyen (UR, class of 2025)

Publications Conference and Journal Papers Voting with Preference Intensities. (a) Anson Kahng, Mohamad Latifian, and Nisarg Shah. AAAI 2023. [pdf] Optimized Distortion and Proportional Fairness in Voting. (a) Soroush Ebadian, Anson Kahng, Dominik Peters, and Nisarg Shah. EC 2022. [pdf] Worst-Case Voting When the Stakes Are High. (a) Anson Kahng and Gregory Kehne. AAAI 2022. [pdf] Liquid Democracy: An Algorithmic Perspective. (a) Anson Kahng, Simon Mackenzie, and Ariel D. Procaccia.

Teaching Fall 2023: DSCC/CSC/TCS 462. Computational Introduction to Statistics. Spring 2023: CSC 289/489. Algorithmic Game Theory. Fall 2022: DSCC/CSC/TCS 462. Computational Introduction to Statistics.
